class.name: UtilityAIBTCooldownTicks
class.brief_description: Sets a branch of the behaviour tree into an x number of ticks cooldown after it has been ticked.
class.description: The cooldown nodes can be used to set a branch of the behaviour tree into a cooldown after it has been ticked. When the cooldown node is ticked, it ticks its child node, starts the cooldown and returns what ever the child node returned. It will return the set [member cooldown_return_value] until the cooldown expires.

members.member: The result that is returned during cooldown. Can be either -1=Failure, 0=Running or 1=Success.
The cooldown period in ticks after the cooldown node is ticked.
